title: Bean Rolls from Fluxkit
medium: Metal tin with offset label, containing nine beans and fourteen offset scrolls
dimensions: component (tin): 3 1/8 x 3 1/4 x 3 1/4" (8 x 8.3 x 8.2 cm); component (scrolls, rolled, each approx.): 9/16 x 2 3/4" (1.5 x 7 cm); component (bean, approx.): 3/8 x 1/4 x 1/8" (1 x 0.6 x 0.3 cm)
credits: The Gilbert and Lila Silverman Fluxus Collection Gift
